headline: Baker Hughes (BKR): Is the Stock Still Undervalued After Its Recent Rally?
summary: Baker Hughes (BKR) shares have been steadily gaining over the past month as investors look for opportunities in the energy sector. The company’s recent performance reflects renewed interest in oilfield technology and services, supported by a resilient market environment. See our latest analysis for Baker Hughes. Baker Hughes’ 20.7% year-to-date share price return is turning heads, especially after a solid string of recent gains. While the energy sector remains full of moving parts, investors...

headline: AI Becomes the Operating Backbone of the Power Sector
summary: AI is transforming the entire energy value chain, from optimizing oil and gas exploration and drilling to improving renewable energy forecasting, grid stability, and smart-grid management.
